title: 31,000 msgs in inbox.  Can only delete one-at-a-time.  HELP!
content: 31,000 msgs in inbox. Can only delete one-at-a-time. Keep getting error messages when I try to delete or move more than 1 msg. "Can't write to folder","Writing to folder failed", etc. HELP!
creator: ammoguide

title: GMail is crowding out Thunderbird.
content: Until recently any request to email a web-page, automatically set up the message in my Thunderbird form. Recently the messages are being set up in my Gmail account. I NEVER send messages via Gmail, always through Thunderbird.
creator: lestkelly
